channel.title: REPOST: String Help
channel.description:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,476094.msg3482178.html#msg3482178
Hey guys, I need help.
Will this code work?
[code=java]if(command.startsWith("Rares")) { String[] rareItems = { "Red Halloween Mask", "Blue Halloween Mask", "Green Halloween Mask", "Red Partyhat", "Blue Partyhat", "Green Partyhat", "Purple Partyhat", "White Partyhat", "Yellow Partyhat" }; // Array of Rares int i = 8149; // Make sure we start on the correct line for (String s : rareItems) { // Loop through all Prices String[] itemCosts = { "632M", "798M", "997M", "560M", "707M", "672M", "303M" }; // Array of Prices int i = 8150; // Make sure we start on the correct line for (String s : itemCosts) { // Loop through all Prices sendQuest(s, i++); // Print each price on a new line }[/code]

item.title: REPOST: String Help

item.description:

Hey guys, I need help.

Will this code work?

if(command.startsWith("Rares")) { String[] rareItems = { "Red Halloween Mask", "Blue Halloween Mask", "Green Halloween Mask", "Red Partyhat", "Blue Partyhat", "Green Partyhat", "Purple Partyhat", "White Partyhat", "Yellow Partyhat" }; // Array of Rares int i = 8149; // Make sure we start on the correct line for (String s : rareItems) { // Loop through all Prices String[] itemCosts = { "632M", "798M", "997M", "560M", "707M", "672M", "303M" }; // Array of Prices int i = 8150; // Make sure we start on the correct line for (String s : itemCosts) { // Loop through all Prices sendQuest(s, i++); // Print each price on a new line }
